Articles.Content:
Anyone got some .craft files that have the Kolonization mod on it?

I really want to get a Mun base.

Assume you're talking about USI-MKS/OKS? Well unfortunately while I love building bases and stations, they all contain other bits from other mods as well. But then there would be the issue of you getting it to the Mun, I also assume you have HyperEdit? Either way, if it is a surface base you are after I would suggest the link below, they are way easier to assemble and deliver than USI stuff. Not saying that USI isn't super fun and cool but K&K makes it easier and personally I think more what you are after. [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127413-WIP-1-0-5-Kerbal-Planetary-Base-Systems-v0-2-10-Update-17-11-2015"]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127413-WIP-1-0-5-Kerbal-Planetary-Base-Systems-v0-2-10-Update-17-11-2015


[/URL] Edited November 21, 2015 by Glaran K'erman

No problem! And just a note, don't be scared that it is still in the In-Development section. This is one of those occasions when a mod that is "in development", is actually more complete than most fully released mods.
Since you're asking for craft, this thread has been moved to the craft exchange subforum.
bump, id like to see what other people have made for surface bases in MKS.

The simplest base to land with crew, in a single launch, is something like this.

Command (scout)

Skycrane engine

Base (scout)

On the 4 attachment points of the base, you'll need at least one supply saddle from the freight tab, filled with lfo.  Two for balance (which is not entirely important in context).  It;s trivially easy to land a hab with storage space for lfo, supplies, and ec.....a hub..on Mun or Duna, for example, which can be taken advantage of by logistics mechanics or models (like the rover or the proximity transfer).

I'll get some pictures and a craft file up shortly.  Long time player (and lurker) - nice to meet yall.  

:edit:

With two LFO saddles, a reactor and an ag module.....  a scout assembly as above has 752ms DV at an initial  5.71twr on Mun.  It creates -slightly- more ec/supplies than required  for the launch crew capacity of two, regardless of who you crew it with.   It's total capacity when deployed is 4.

Mass of 10.765k, wet and fully supplied (empty mulch on ag hab).  Easy to lift, easy to land.  Do you have USI-LS/KIS/KAS/OSE/EPL installed?

 

 

Edited February 19, 2016 by Rhythmcs
retrieved ingame stats
